meanings.definition: Relating to or forming the superstructure of a building.
meanings.sent1: The superstructural design of the house included the rooftop terrace.
meanings.sent2: The architect focused on the superstructural elements like the columns and beams.
meanings.sent3: The superstructural decorations on the roof made the house look like a castle.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination built a superstructural world where houses floated in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The superstructural features of the building stood out against the clear blue sky.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a superstructure.
meanings.sent1: The superstructural details of the ship's design were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The captain admired the superstructural enhancements made to the vessel.
meanings.sent3: The crew joked that the superstructural additions made the ship look like a floating palace.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was superstructural, guiding the team to success.
meanings.sent5: The superstructural improvements to the bridge made it more durable and reliable.

meanings.definition: Existing above or beyond the structure or framework.
meanings.sent1: The superstructural changes in the company's policies affected all employees.
meanings.sent2: The CEO focused on the superstructural aspects of the business strategy.
meanings.sent3: The superstructural shift in management style surprised everyone in the office.
meanings.sent4: Her influence was superstructural, reaching beyond the usual boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The superstructural impact of the decision was felt throughout the organization.
